name: SkipSpike
description:
Jump! Jump again! 

Earth: near-future. 

You are testing the ultimate space apparel to travel to new worlds and avoid the dangers you may find. 

Any mistake could cost the life of courageous astronauts and this test will prevent failures that may occur on the jets that power the jump system. 

Avoid the spikes and keep up the pace!

The life of many are on your hands!

Play on the go, play at home. Buying this Android game you get a PC version as a bonus! 

FEATURING: 

. Clear crisp minimalist and colorful graphics ;

. Unobtrusive menus, jump fast into action ;

. Highly replayable skill-based gameplay ;

. Very simple controls;

. Endless score-based gameplay challenge!
